title: Add Josa Based on Previous Letter in Korean
code: # CRAN version install.packages("josaplay")  # Dev version install.packages("josaplay", repos = "https://mrchypark.r-universe.dev")

title: Add Josa Based on Previous Letter in Korean
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(josaplay)  # 가/와 jsp_gwawa("상품") #> [1] "상품과" jsp_gwawa("텀블러") #> [1] "텀블러와"  # 은/는 jsp_eunneun("사랑") #> [1] "사랑은" jsp_eunneun("탁자") #> [1] "탁자는"  # 이/가 jsp_iga("고객") #> [1] "고객이" jsp_iga("모니터") #> [1] "모니터가"  # 을/를 jsp_eulleul("패키지") #> [1] "패키지를" jsp_eulleul("컵") #> [1] "컵을"  # number jsp_iga("145") #> [1] "145가" jsp_iga("k146") #> [1] "k146이"  # with pipe "상품" %>% jsp_gwawa() #> [1] "상품과"
